name: cloudflare-vless-worker
description: Cloudflare Worker for VLESS proxy with obfuscation and generated files

scripts.build:raw: npm run prepare-build && wrangler build src/index.built.js --outdir dist --name worker-raw && mv dist/_worker.js dist/worker.raw.js
scripts.obfuscate: npm run build:raw && npx javascript-obfuscator dist/worker.raw.js --output _worker.js && cp _worker.js dist/worker.obfuscated.js
scripts.deploy:raw: npm run build:raw && wrangler deploy dist/worker.raw.js --no-bundle

author: NiREvil
